features.name: Staff
features.description: Melee: +2 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 6 (1d8 + 2) bludgeoning damage.

features.name: Energy Orbs
features.description: Save: DC 12 vs DEX, range 60 ft., two targets or the same target twice. Hit: 3 (1d4+1) acid damage.

features.name: Dragon Breath
features.description: Save: DC 12 vs CON, a 15 ft. cone starting from you, all targets. Hit: 6 (1d6 + 3) acid damage. Miss: half damage.

features.name: Shifty
features.description: When one of your allies that you can see is reduced to 0 hp. You may move up to half your speed without provoking an opportunity attack.

features.name: Healer
features.description: Utility: range 30 ft., one friendly creature. Effect: the creature regains 6 hit points.
